DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate influence circadian rhythm progesterone level follicular phase natural cycle follicular phase control ovarian stimulation IVF .
DOC.brief_title: Progesterone Diurnal Rhythm During Ovarian Stimulation IVF
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study determine circadian rhythm progesterone stimulate cycle . Sample size calculation show study need recruit 10 woman show significant difference progesterone secrete morning 8 compare secrete even 8 pm . We increase number participant 12 order compensate possible drop out . The hormone FSH , LH , Progesterone Estradiol measure day 2/3 , 8 , 10 12 normal stimulated cycle patient serf control . This study provide basis establish optimal blood sampling time progesterone measurement accurately determine cut-off level progesterone favourable pregnancy outcome ART .
DOC.criteria: Indication IVF / ICSI treatment Age ≥ 18 year ≤ 35 year Ovarian reserve parameter adequate age range , determine AntiMullerianHormone ( AMH ) Antral Follicle Count ( AFC ) ( 16 ) Able understand aim study provide consent Regular cycle ( 2535 day ) Diagnosis polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) Rotterdam criterion Endometriosis stage 3 4 AFS Treatment GnRHanalogues previous 6 month Intake oral contraceptive pill ( OCP ) hormonal treatment last 3 month
